00022 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00023 /// CPuzzleView::CPuzzleView
00024 ///
00025 /// @description    This is the default constructor for the CPuzzleView class.
00026 /// @pre            None
00027 /// @post           Member variables are initialized.
00028 ///
00029 /// @param parent:  This is a pointer to the parent object.
00030 ///
00031 /// @limitations    None
00032 ///
00033 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00034 CPuzzleView::CPuzzleView( QWidget *parent )
00035 : IGNATView( parent )
00036 {
00037     m_graphView = new CPuzzleGraphView( this );
00038     m_traceView = new CPuzzleTraceView( this );
00039     m_traceView->setGraphModel( m_graphView->getModel() );
00040     //m_traceView->hide();
00041 
00042     addWidget( m_graphView );
00043     addWidget( m_traceView );
00044 
00045     setChildrenCollapsible( false );
00046 
00047     QList<int> sizes;
00048     sizes.append(200);
00049     sizes.append(200);
00050 
00051     setSizes( sizes );
00052 }
00053

00069 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00070 /// CPuzzleView::loadFromFile
00071 ///
00072 /// @description     This function loads the data in the indicated file.
00073 /// @pre             None
00074 /// @post            The data stored in the indicated file is loaded, provided
00075 ///                  it is a valid file.
00076 ///
00077 /// @param fileName: This is a reference to a QString containing the filename
00078 ///                  to load data from.
00079 ///
00080 /// @limitations     None
00081 ///
00082 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00083 void CPuzzleView::loadFromFile( const QString &fileName )
00084 {
00085     m_graphView->loadFromFile( fileName );
00086     m_traceView->setGraphModel( m_graphView->getModel() );
00087 }

00108 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00109 /// CPuzzleView::saveToFile
00110 ///
00111 /// @description     This function saves the current data to the indicated file.
00112 /// @pre             None
00113 /// @post            The current data is saved to the indicated file, provided
00114 ///                  it is a valid file.
00115 ///
00116 /// @param fileName: This is a reference to a QString containing the filename
00117 ///                  to save the current data to.
00118 ///
00119 /// @limitations     None
00120 ///
00121 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00122 void CPuzzleView::saveToFile(const QString &fileName)
00123 {
00124     m_graphView->saveToFile( fileName );
00125 }

00127 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00128 /// CPuzzleView::setupToolBar
00129 ///
00130 /// @description  This function initializes the toolbar that is used for the
00131 ///               tree view.
00132 /// @pre          None
00133 /// @post         The tree view toolbar is initialized.
00134 ///
00135 /// @limitations  None
00136 ///
00137 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00138 void CPuzzleView::setupToolBar()
00139 {
00140     QAction *tempAction;
00141     QLabel *tempLabel;
00142     m_toolBar = new QToolBar( "Puzzle View", this );
00143 
00144     tempAction = m_toolBar->addAction( QIcon(":/toggleheuristics.png"),
00145                                        "Toggle visible heuristic values" );
00146     tempAction->setCheckable( true );
00147     tempAction->setChecked( false );
00148     connect( tempAction, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), m_graphView,
00149              SLOT(toggleHeuristics(bool)) );
00150 
00151 
00152     tempAction = m_toolBar->addAction( QIcon(":/graph.png"), "Show Graph" );
00153     tempAction->setCheckable( true );
00154     tempAction->setChecked( true );
00155     connect( tempAction, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), m_graphView,
00156              SLOT(setShown(bool)) );
00157 
00158 
00159     tempAction = m_toolBar->addAction(QIcon(":/trace.png"), "Show Trace" );
00160     tempAction->setCheckable( true );
00161     tempAction->setChecked( true );
00162     connect( tempAction, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), m_traceView,
00163              SLOT(setShown(bool)) );
00164 
00165     m_toolBar->addSeparator();
00166 
00167     // "AI Config Menu" button
00168     m_toolBar->addWidget(m_traceView->getAIConfigButton());
00169 
00170 
00171     m_toolBar->addWidget( m_traceView->getAISelector() );
00172     m_toolBar->addWidget( m_traceView->getTreeGraphSelector() );
00173 
00174 
00175     // AI Label
00176     tempLabel = m_traceView->getAILabel();
00177     m_toolBar->addWidget( m_traceView->getAILabel() );
00178 
00179     // Depth spinbox
00180     tempLabel = new QLabel( m_toolBar );
00181     tempLabel->setTextFormat(Qt::AutoText);
00182     tempLabel->setText( "  Depth" );
00183     m_toolBar->addWidget( tempLabel );
00184     m_toolBar->addWidget( m_traceView->getDepthSelector() );
00185 
00186     // "Save Trace" button
00187     tempAction = m_toolBar->addAction(QIcon(":/latex.png"), "Save Trace");
00188     connect( tempAction, SIGNAL(activated()), m_traceView, SLOT(saveTrace()) );
00189 
00190 }

00193 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00194 /// CPuzzleView::signalRepaint
00195 ///
00196 /// @description  This function tells the graph and trace views that they need
00197 ///               to redraw because a parameter has changed in the style tool
00198 ///               kit.
00199 ///               
00200 /// @pre          None
00201 /// @post         The graph and trace view are redrawn.
00202 ///
00203 /// @limitations  None
00204 ///
00205 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00206 void CPuzzleView::signalRepaint(void)
00207 {
00208  if(m_graphView) m_graphView->signalRepaint();
00209  if(m_traceView) m_traceView->signalRepaint();
00210 }
